about_the_game:
Definitely Sneaky But Not Sneaky is a top-down action game packed with difficult levels. Hack, slash, and shoot everything in your path. Earn points by completing levels efficiently to unlock different weapons, items, and skills you can combine into your loadouts!

Local multiplayer

4-person local multiplayer is featured with the ability to mix different control types (one player on a keyboard, another on a PS4 controller, and a third on an Xbox controller, etc.) to get as many people playing as possible. Use Steam's new Remote Play feature to play with other Steam users with just one copy of the game!

Action-Stealth gameplay

Most levels allow you to approach them in different ways. Take out enemies before they notice you with melee or silenced weapons! Or run in with a flamethrower and some grenades.

Slow-mo

Use awesome slow-motion effects to your advantage when dodging bullets, exploding things, and more.

Versus mode

Play local co-op versus with 2-4 players. Go free-for-all or split into teams!

Survival mode

Survive never-ending waves of enemies, purchase upgrades with kills, and explore the larger maps!

Level editor with Steam Workshop integration

With the built-in level editor, create all the levels you can see in the Classic mode and more! Build your levels, string them into level packs, and share them with the Steam community via Steam Workshop. Download others' published packs to play for yourself.

Gamepad support

With both keyboard/mouse and controller support, you can play the game whichever way is more comfortable. However, it's important to note that the game will play better with a controller.

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes cartoon blood and violence.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 242 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“Definitely Sneaky But Not Sneaky took a little bit of getting used to, but was hard to stop playing once I’d got a feel for it.”
Rock Paper Shotgun
short_description: Definitely Sneaky But Not Sneaky is a fast-paced action game featuring tight controls and epic slow-mo combat. Unlock items, customize your gear, and take out your enemies one by one! Co-op included.
